short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides you to attach tags for your starred repositories on GitHub.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install this extenson, and go to GitHub website.


You can see
1. Link(this link addded other pages in GitHub)
2. Edit tags field
3. Filter repos bt tags field

* Click "Edit tags" button(#2), and text area appears.
* Edit tags following the hint.

* Click a tag or tags in filter by tags field(#3), and repos which have selected a tag or tags are displayed.
